data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Salamanca that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 62 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Father, we rejoice that you who began a good work in the church of Salamanca, Castilla y León, Spain will carry it on to completion until the day of Jesus Christ!
data.verse: being confident of this, that he who began a good work in you will carry it on to completion until the day of Christ Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Arab, Tunisian people. 1.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, your Word can be a lamp to the feet of the 268,462 people in the county of Salamanca who claim to know you, if they open it and read it today.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Salamanca, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the county of Salamanca words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."
